Package com.samuel.gymtracker.service

Class CustomTemplateManager

java.lang.Object
com.samuel.gymtracker.service.CustomTemplateManager
public final class CustomTemplateManager extends Object
handles creation, loading, deletion, and persistence of user workout template templates are stored as mapping from template name to list of exxs

      Parameters:

      Returns:
